study.s_question: What is the supreme law of the land?

study.s_answer: Sets up the government, Defines the government, Protects basic rights of Americans

study.s_question: The idea of self-government is in the first three words of the Constitution. What are these words?

study.s_answer: a change (to the Constitution), an addition (to the Constitution)

study.s_question: What do we call the first ten amendments to the Constitution?
